record.description: Elements of bimolecular organization, H. Fernandez-Moran. Magnification x 900,000. High-resolution electron micrograph of negatively stained T2 bacteriophage showing complex organization of the head and tail components of this bacterial virus. Notice the texture of the head membrane (HM), period sheath striations (SC), and tail plate (BC) with attached kinked fibers (F).
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: See also April/May 1969 issue U of C magazine.
